title: Fnatic LCS-es csapattal mi történt???
body: Annyit tudok hogy Rekkles már az Alliance ment át. Ennyire rosszul ment volna nekik vagy most mivan??? Olyat is hallottam hogy xPeke majd saját csapatot akar csinálni...akkor most nem fognak indulni az LCS-en???

replies.body:
Új csapatot csinál, a Fanatic meg új tagokból fog állni.
Off Season Team News

North America:
Dignitas announced their new lineup for the 2015 Season:
Gamsu - Top
Crumbzz - Jungle
Shiphtur - Mid
Core JJ  AD
KiWiKiD - Support

Europe:
Both Cyanide and xPeke announced that they would be leaving the Fnatic organization.
Cyanide will be retiring
xPeke's newly formed team will be called Origen.gg

Korea/China:
Fly (previously of Jin Air) and Save (previously of NaJin White Shield) both join Invictus Gaming. 
Dade and Looper (formerly from Samsung White/Blue) both joined Team WE Academy. 
Ackerman (formerly of LMQ and now known as GodLike) rejoined Star Horn Royal Club
Vasilii (formerly of LMQ) announced he would be joining Vici Gaming along with head coach Homme (former top laner/team captain of Samsung White)
Spirit (formerly of Samsung Blue) announced he would be joining Team WE. 
Flame announced he would be leaving CJ Entus and Ambition would be moving to the jungle role. 
PawN (formerly of Samsung White) announced he would be joining EDward Gaming. 

forrás: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/12/this-week-in-esports-iem-san-jose.html [](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/12/this-week-in-esports-iem-san-jose.html)
Maga a csapat nem bomlik fel, csak friss játékosbázissal fognak játszani.
